channel.title: PI Piety Chiv glitch

item.title: PI Piety Chiv glitch
item.dc:creator: @Nathan8888 Nathan8888
item.description:
@Nathan8888 wrote:

alright well i got a code from I Vain I that syas you need 70 prayer to use piety ad 60 for chiv. But when you use piety and ur prayer is 69/99 or less but u have 70 prayer u cant use piety or chivalry any help pleasE!!!

My codes

case 70092: // chiv if (c.playerLevel[c.playerPrayer] >= 60) { c.getCombat().activatePrayer(24); } else { c.sendMessage("Sorry, but your prayer level has to be level 60 to use this."); } break; case 70094:piet if (c.playerLevel[c.playerPrayer] >= 70) { c.getCombat().activatePrayer(25); } else { c.sendMessage("Sorry, but your prayer level has to be level 70 to use this."); } break;

Read full topic
